Content: The bitbang JTAG from old references no longer works on Raspi 5.

Author: carlfk
Content: my pj project above was mean to debug pi boot - the pico PIO pins are routed to the Pi jgag.  but I also added a header so they could be hooked to somethint else (like NeTV2)

Author: carlfk
Content: I have no idea if this is helpful, and now I am wondering if being hoked to both will be a problem (seems like it)

Author: carlfk
Content: oh right, the idea was don't plug the hat into the pi, then it isn't hooked to the pi jtag.

Author: carlfk
Content: er.. looking at it in Kicad, there is no jtag header.  I guess the idea is I can use the pi hat header holes for something else if it isn't on a pi
